edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager

Class RegistrationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager

  • public class RegistrationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    creates and manages the registration system including the coursecatalog, studentDirectory, an instance of the manager, and the registrar
    Author:
    William
